name: Feint
description:
With a misleading flourish, you leave an opponent unprepared 
for your real attack. Attempt a Deception check against that 
opponent’s Perception DC.With a misleading flourish, you leave an opponent unprepared 
for your real attack. Attempt a Deception check against that 
opponent’s Perception DC.

effects.criticalSuccess:
You throw your enemy’s defenses against 
you entirely off. The target is flat-footed against melee 
attacks that you attempt against it until the end of your 
next turn.
effects.success:
Your foe is fooled, but only momentarily. The target is 
f
 lat-footed against the next melee attack that you attempt 
against it before the end of your current turn.
effects.criticalFailure:
Your feint backfires. You are flat-footed against 
melee attacks the target attempts against you until the end 
of your next turn.

rules:
You are within melee reach of the opponent you 
attempt to Feint.
